Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Modernizing DNS/DHCP: Micetro across hybrid and cloud environments | ODSP1424
Description:
Application slowdowns, failed logins, and jitter often trace back to DNS. Yet DNS failures are among the hardest to detect. BlueCatâ€™s Intelligent NetOps combines flow and packet analytics with DNS telemetry, giving NetOps and DDI teams a shared view of root causes. Gain insight into how integrated observability and assurance reduce MTTR, automate detection, and resolve DNS-driven outages before they impact users.
